original_text:
Big Bucks Buffalo Gigablox
Le lande selvagge dell’Arizona
Insieme all’aquila, il bisonte è forse il simbolo che meglio rappresenta gli Stati Uniti, celebrato nella cultura dei nativi nordamericani tanto da essere uno dei totem più importanti. Questi animali mastodontici vivono in mandrie e quando si muovono fanno tremare la terra, proprio come accade in Big Bucks Buffalo GigaBlox, la nuova slot di Yggdrasil che, siamo certi, ha tutte le carte in regola per diventare un grande classico del mondo del gioco online.
Appena aperta la schermata iniziale ci ritroviamo di fronte alle aride lande del Nevada, con arbusti bassi e secchi e le alte vette che potrebbero essere quelle della Valle della Morte.
La griglia di gioco è racchiusa in una cornice di legno e il colore predominante è il marrone chiaro, il giallo e l’oro. I simboli sono ben disegnati, con un ottimo uso del nero e delle ombre così da dare un senso di tridimensionalità. Ci è piaciuto il fatto che ad ogni Spin i rulli Gigablox cominciano a tremare come se accanto stesse passando una mandria di bisonti.
Prima di iniziare il gioco, ci viene chiesto se desideriamo disattivare la musica, un motivetto western che rende più vivide le atmosfere del gioco.
 
Caratteristiche di Big Bucks Buffalo GigaBlox
La prima cosa da fare per giocare è effettuare la puntata, che va da un minimo di 0,40 €. Essendo 40 le linee di pagamento fisse, vuol dire che ogni linea costa appena 0,01 €. La griglia di gioco ha 6 rulli e 4 righe, ma il numero di simboli è variabile. Infatti, ad ogni Spin le icone possono atterrare con grandezze Gigablox, ossia di dimensioni 2×2 o 4×4. Va da sé che questo si traduce in maggiori possibilità di formare combo paganti.
Con l’Autoplay si può decidere di impostare un numero di giri automatici che va da 10 a 1.000.
Il ritorno teorico al giocatore non è molto alto, essendo pari al 94%. Ricordiamo però che questo dato si riferisce a un altissimo numero di partite effettuate da una moltitudine di giocatori e non influenza minimamente le giocate del singolo individuo.
 
Come si vince a Big Bucks Buffalo GigaBlox
Per vincere è necessario formare combo di almeno tre simboli partendo dal rullo di sinistra e procedendo verso destra su bobine adiacenti. In base alle dimensioni, i simboli Gigablox valgono quanto 4 o 8 simboli.
I semi delle carte da gioco (cuori, picche, quadri e fiori) sono i simboli che valgono meno, seguiti dall’alce, dal lupo, dall’aquila reale e dal bisonte. Il Wild sostituisce tutti i simboli eccetto lo Scatter, qui rappresentato dal gettone d’oro. Quando sui rulli ne atterrano 6 vengono assegnati 3 Respins durante i quali i gettoni assumono un valore compreso tra 1x e 1.000x. Se il gettone è di tipo Gigablox, allora la somma viene raddoppiata. Inoltre, ogni nuovo gettone viene bloccato sui rulli e i Respins riportati a 3.

Domande Frequenti 
Ci sono i giri automatici?

Sì, la funzione Autoplay è presente e permette di impostare da 10 a 1.000 giri automatici.

raw_translation.response:
Big Bucks Buffalo Gigablox
The Wilds of Arizona
Alongside the eagle, the buffalo is perhaps the symbol that best represents the United States, celebrated in Native American culture as one of the most important totems. These mammoth animals live in herds and when they move, the earth shakes, just like in Big Bucks Buffalo Gigablox, the new slot game from Yggdrasil that we are sure has all the cards to become a great classic in the world of online gambling.
As soon as you open the initial screen, you find yourself facing the arid lands of Nevada, with low and dry bushes and the tall peaks that could be those of Death Valley.
The game grid is enclosed in a wooden frame and the predominant colors are light brown, yellow, and gold. The symbols are well designed, with excellent use of black and shadows to give a sense of three-dimensionality. We liked the fact that with each Spin, the Gigablox reels start to shake as if a buffalo herd were passing by.
Before starting the game, you are asked if you want to turn off the music, a western motif that makes the game's atmosphere more vivid.

Features of Big Bucks Buffalo Gigablox
The first thing to do to play is to place a bet, which starts from a minimum of €0.40. With 40 fixed paylines, this means that each line costs only €0.01. The game grid has 6 reels and 4 rows, but the number of symbols is variable. In fact, with each Spin, the icons can land with Gigablox sizes, that is, 2x2 or 4x4 dimensions. It goes without saying that this translates into more possibilities to form paying combos.
With Autoplay, you can decide to set a number of automatic spins ranging from 10 to 1,000.
The theoretical return to player is not very high, being equal to 94%. However, we remind you that this data refers to a very large number of games played by a multitude of players and minimally affects the individual player's bets.

How to win at Big Bucks Buffalo Gigablox
To win, it is necessary to form combos of at least three symbols starting from the leftmost reel and proceeding towards adjacent reels on the right. Depending on the size, Gigablox symbols are worth as much as 4 or 8 symbols.
The playing card suits (hearts, spades, diamonds, and clubs) are the symbols worth the least, followed by the moose, wolf, bald eagle, and buffalo. The Wild replaces all symbols except the Scatter, represented here by the gold token. When 6 of them land on the reels, 3 Respins are awarded during which the tokens take on a value between 1x and 1,000x. If the token is a Gigablox type, then the sum is doubled. In addition, each new token is locked on the reels and the Respins reset to 3.

Frequently Asked Questions
Are automatic Spins available?
Yes, the Autoplay feature is present and allows you to set from 10 to 1,000 automatic spins.

But what sets this game apart from the herd? Well, it all starts with the Wild symbol. This symbol can replace all symbols on the reels except for the Scatter. And speaking of Scatter symbols, keep an eye out for the gold token. If you manage to land 6 of them, you'll earn 3 Respins. But that's not all! response.headline: Game Design
response.content:
If you're tired of the mundane and boring slot machine designs, then the Big Bucks Buffalo Gigablox might be the answer to your prayers. The game's design is a breath of fresh air with its wooden frame enclosing the game grid, light brown, yellow, and gold as predominant colors, and a western feel to it. Now, I'm no expert in interior design, but this game is like the interior designer's dream come true. I mean, have you seen those symbols? They're so well designed and three-dimensionality that I almost want to take them out of the game and put them on my bookshelf. I'll admit that might be an extremist of me, but don't judge me until you've played the game.

What I liked most about the design of this game is how aligned it is with the title. When I played it, I felt transported to the wild wild west, where I could hear the sound of buffalo hooves approaching, and the Gigablox reels started shaking to their rhythm. Even the background music was well-thought-out. It's western motif music that can be turned off if it's not your jam, but I recommend keeping it on just to complete the experience. Unlike most online slot games, Big Bucks Buffalo Gigablox doesn't give you bland visuals that don't live up to the game's theme. Instead, it matches everything—the title, the symbols, the soundtracks, and the overall gaming experience.

Let's take a moment to appreciate the creativity and artistry that went into creating Big Bucks Buffalo Gigablox's design. It's not every day that you can enjoy a well-designed online game that meets all your expectations. Whoever designed this game is a genius, and they deserve all the accolades that come with it. What I'm trying to say is that the Big Bucks Buffalo Gigablox isn't just a game but an experience. Kudos to the team that made this masterpiece possible.
